com.ibm.team.workitem.common.model

Interface IApproval


  • public interface IApproval
    An approval from a single contributor with a particular state.
    Since:
    0.6
    See Also:
    IApprovals, WorkItemApprovals, IWorkItem.getApprovals()

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String STATE_IDENTIFIER_PROPERTY
      State identifier property name.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IContributorHandle getApprover()
      Returns the contributor that is asked for approval.
      IApprovalDescriptor getDescriptor()
      Returns the approval descriptor this approval belongs to.
      java.lang.String getStateIdentifier()
      Returns the state of this approval.
      void setStateIdentifier(java.lang.String identifier)
      Sets the state of this approval to the given state.
